name: Real Drums Game
description:
All-new, sensational percussion game!

Are you a music enthusiast? Do you love sound of the drums? Do you want to play new music game? We got something just for you!

Real Drums Game – wonderful game for all music lovers! Become percussion master and amaze everyone! Become the best drummer in the world!

Every stage of Real Drums Game has different set of melodies and special effects. Find them all!

Play like a real music hero! Throw away your guitar and piano – now it’s time for drummers!
Be wild! Release your inner animal and drum like crazy!
Play most savage melodies!
Make some noise!

Feel like a real performer and make the audience dance like crazy!
If you are looking for something special, you finally find it!

Try it!

- 5 fantastic stages
- 25 levels
- Wonderful real percussion set
- Great music, recorded in professional studio by talented artists
- Realistic sounds
- Free play mode
- 2 difficulty modes
- Intuitive menu
- Pure joy of playing
- Unique design

If you have any questions, contact us:
mobile@netigen.pl
